summary: Intro music file replaces classical intro music with the fabulous dragon born song by Peter Hollens (vocals) and Lindsey Stirling (violin).
descriptionHtml:
[center]Intro music file replaces classical intro music with the fabulous dragon born song by Peter Hollens and Lindsey Stirling.

[youtube]BSLPH9d-jsI[/youtube]

[color=red][b]I\'m not the author, only converts to a file xwm and packed with rar.[/b][/color]


I hope the quality of the song is good. I have the song itself in there and find him better.
It is also my first upload, please do not be so strict with me.
Should be in the file, or in the music to be a bug, please let me know, thanks.[/center]



[color=red][b]Sorry, I had to upload a better version, because I had forgotten the conclusion (the voices of making of) to cut away.[/b][/color]

[color=yellow]Orginal by Arr.: Tom Anderson, edit: Ben Lieberman, mix: Bill Harek, vocals: Peter Hollens, violin: Lindsey Stirling[/color]
author: Tamara Klein
